description: The user's content are items either in the home folder for the user, e.g. /content/users/<username>, or in a subfolder of the home folder with the given folder ID. Multilevel folders are not supported. You can also see the Quick reference topic for additional information on this. Items in a folder are stored by reference and are not physically in a folder. Rather, they're stored as links to the original item, e.g. /content/items/<itemId>. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/User_Content/02r30000007p000000/
title: userContent

items.description: The list of the user's items. See Item for response properties for more details

item.description: An item (a unit of content) in the portal. Each item has a unique identifier and a well known URL that is independent of the user owning the item. An item can have associated binary or textual data that's available via the item data resource. For example, an item of type Map Package returns the actual bits corresponding to the map package via the item data resource. The numViews is incremented when an item is opened. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/index.html#/Item/02r30000007w000000/
item.title: item

id.description: The unique ID for this item

owner.description: The username of the user who owns this item

created.description: The date the folder was created. Shown in UNIX time

modified.description: The date the folder was last modified. Shown in UNIX time

name.description: The file name of the item for file types. Read-only

title.description: The title of the item. This is the name that's displayed to users and by which they refer to the item. Every item must have a title

type.description: The GIS content type of this item. Example types include Web Map, Map Service, Shapefile, and Web Mapping Application. See the overview section of Items and item types to get an understanding of the item type hierarchy
type.pattern: Web Map|CityEngine Web Scene|Web Scene|Pro Map|Feature Service|Map Service|Image Service|KML|WMS|Feature Collection|Feature Collection Template|Geodata Service|Globe Service|Geometry Service|Geocoding Service|Network Analysis Service|Geoprocessing Service|Workflow Manager Service|Web Mapping Application|Mobile Application|Code Attachment|Operations Dashboard Add In|Operation View|Operations Dashboard Extension|Native Application|Native Application Template|Native Application Installer|Symbol Set|Color Set|Shapefile|File geodatabase|CSV|CAD Drawing|Service Definition|Document Link|Microsoft Word|Microsoft Powerpoint|Microsoft Excel|PDF|Image|Visio Document|iWork Keynote|iWork Pages|iWork Numbers|Map Document|Map Package|Mobile Basemap Package|Tile Package|Project Package|Task File|ArcPad Package|Explorer Map|Globe Document|Scene Document|Published Map|Map Template|Windows Mobile Package|Layout|Project Template|Layer|Layer Package|Explorer Layer|Desktop Style|Geoprocessing Package|Geoprocessing Package (Pro Version)|Geoprocessing Sample|Locator Package|Rule Package|Raster function template|Workflow Manager Package|Desktop Application|Desktop Application Template|Code Sample|Desktop Add In|Explorer Add In

typeKeywords.description: A set of keywords that further describes the type of this item. Each item is tagged with a set of type keywords that are derived based on its primary type

tags.description: User defined tags that describe the item

snippet.description: A short summary description of the item

thumbnail.description: The URL to the thumbnail used for the item. Relative to Item's URL

largeThumbnail.description: Primarily applies to thumbnails associated with an application. The URL to the thumbnail used for the application. Relative to Item's URL

banner.description: Primarily applies to the banner associated with an application. The URL to the banner used for the application. Relative to Item's URL

screenshots.description: Primarily applies to screenshots associated with an application. The URL to the screenshots used for the application

spatialReference.description: The coordinate system of the item

accessInformation.description: Information on the source of the item and its copyright status

culture.description: The item locale information (language and country)

languages.description: Primarily applies to languages associated with the application

url.description: The URL for the resource represented by the item. Applies only to items that represent web-accessible resources such as map services

access.description: Indicates the level of access to this item: private, shared, org, or public

commentsEnabled.description: Indicates if comments are allowed on the item

numComments.description: Number of comments on this item

numRatings.description: Number of ratings for this item

numViews.description: Total number of views for this item

industries.description: Primarily applies to industries associated with the application

listed.description: If true, the item is listed in the marketplace

ownerFolder.description: The ID of the folder in which the owner has stored the item. The property is only returned to the item owner or the org admin

protected.description: Protects the item from deletion. false is the default

folder.description: The current folder listing the user's items
folder.title: folder

created.description: The date the folder was created. Shown in UNIX time.

extent.description: The bounding rectangle of the item. Should always be in WGS84
extent.title: extent
